text: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ ۖ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا

translation.en.sahih: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.
translation.id.indonesian: Berkata Ibrahim: "Semoga keselamatan dilimpahkan kepadamu, aku akan memintakan ampun bagimu kepada Tuhanku. Sesungguhnya Dia sangat baik kepadaku.
